pageContent: LOGINLOGOUTHELPPrinter FriendlyPageEarthfiles, news category.Share:DiggFacebookStumbleUpon Part 1 - Brazilian Air Force Opens Its UFO Files to Public© 2005 by Linda Moulton Howe May 26, 2005 Corguinho, Brazil - On Friday, May 20, the Brazilian Air Force had ameeting in that nation's capitol, Brasilia, with UFO researchers at Brazil's version ofNORAD known as CINDACTA I. There it was announced that current Brazil President,Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva known to the Brazil public as "President Lula" - supportsopening most government suppressed files including UFO cases, political prisoner files andother secrets kept by previous Brazil administrations. One of the UFO researchers invitedto the May 20th Brazilian Air Force meeting was farmer, Urandir Oliveira, from Corguinhoin the state of Mato Grosso do Sul. Left: Urandir Oliveira in left foreground at Brazil's CINDACTA I headquarters in the country's capitol,Brasilia,on Friday, May 20, 2005. Right: Brazilian Air Force officials announced release of UFOfiles to public. Photographs © 2005 by Felipe Branco. Mr. Oliveira operates a farm with his wife, children, parents and cousins where manystrange aerial objects and lights have been seen for decades by the Corguinho residents.Over the past seven years, Mr. Oliveira has also described his own encounters with craftand tall blond extraterrestrials for Globo TV and other Brazilian media, which is why hewas invited to the Brasilia meeting last Friday. [See: 121902Earthfiles ] Ecovila Fezenda, 209 acre farm owned by Urandir Oliveira and his family, in Corguinho, Brazil.February 2003 photograph © 2003 by Linda Moulton Howe. This week I talked with Urandir Oliveira in Corguino. The Portuguese-to-Englishtranslation was provided by Brazilian businessman, Felipe Branco. Mr. Branco is anexecutive in his family's company, Castelo Branco Ltd. - a ranching and holding companywith offices in Rio de Janeiro, Campo Grande and Italy. Mr. Branco has taken a deepinterest in researching UFOs and close encounters with what seem to be non-human beingssince his own first experience with a tall, red-haired, green-eyed female in 1968. He was5-years-old then, living in Campo Grande. He and his family have a ranch there which isabout 60 miles (100 kilometers) southeast of Corguinho.

Sao Paulo, Brazil, has a population around 18 million. Campo Grande, in thestate of Mato Grosso Do Sul, has a population of about 850,000.Rochedo ("Little Rock)," the nearest town to Corguinho andUrandir Oliveira's farm, has a population of a few hundred people and isnearly two hours on rough, dirt roads from Campo Grande.In 1996, Felipe and his brother began traveling to Corguinho after they heard about thealleged UFO abductions of farmer Urandir Oliveira. Since then, Mr. Branco and his familyhave researched phenomena in the remote valley where he and many others have seenunidentified aerial craft and various types of non-human entities, and where recently hehad an encounter with what he calls a "plasma ball" which entered his body. More aboutthat later in this report. But first, the news from Brasilia. I asked Urandir Oliveira andFelipe Branco why the Brazilian Air Force now suddenly opened up UFO and othergovernment files to the public?Interview:Urandir Oliveira, Farmer and UFO Abductee, Corguinho, Mato Grosso Do Sul,Brazil, Translated by Felipe Branco, Castelo Branco Ltd., Campo Grande, MatoGrosso Do Sul, Brazil : "Urandir says there is a Congressman in 2004 who started puttingpressure on the government. He said it is also policy from the Lulu government to open allits files not only UFOs, but also concerning the political prisoners in the early 1960s. Allsecret files, they want to open everything to the public like a general effort of disclosure ofall secret documents concerning all different fields not only UFOs. Also politicalpersecutions.SO WAS THIS INITIATED BY THE PRESIDENT OF BRAZIL?He is saying the Congressman last year started the pressure to specifically open Brazil's AirForce UFO files. Then he utilized the good will of Lulu's government to open all files andthen the Air Force proceeded to open its files on UFOs, apparently. As far as I understood,it only initiated with this Congressman Joae Caldas, who represents the State of Sao Pauloand the Liberal Front Party.IS THERE ANYTHING THAT HAS COME OUT THAT IS SURPRISING TOANYBODY?On Sunday, a couple of days ago, there is this TV program called Fantastico! and theyshowed this meeting in Brasilia with the Air Force headquarters. It was an interview withthe Brazil Air Force Commander and a couple of Air Marshals. They were talking aboutUFO files and UFO reality and their research of UFOs, how they are not able to fullyunderstand because of the technology involved is far beyond their comprehension. Theywere speaking openly for about 15 minutes on national television.

THAT WAS ON SUNDAY?A couple of days it was unbelievable, unbelievable!DID THEY SPECIFICALLY SHOW ANY PHOTOGRAPHS OR FILM OF CRASHEDDISCS OR BODIES OR ANYTHING LIKE THAT?They did not go into specifics. They only spoke in general terms. They showed a largeamount of data and documents and studies and they spoke about Operation Prato. Theyspoke in general affirming that UFOs are a reality, they are studying it, they do have filesand they are opening them up to the public. Whoever is interested can go there, show upand request and receive them. That's it. This was on national TV.WHAT WAS THE OPERATION CALLED?Operation Prato, means 'plate.'OPERATION PLATE LIKE MEANING AN AERIAL DISC?Ye s .DID THEY SAY ANYTHING ABOUT THE RELATIONSHIP OF THE BRAZILIANGOVERNMENT TO THE AMERICAN GOVERNMENT CONCERNING UFOINVESTIGATIONS?No, they did not say that.THAT REMAINS THE MYSTERY ABOUT WHO IS IN CONTROL OFINVESTIGATIONS IN BRAZIL?They said that they are willing to work also with various UFO research groups, to make apartnership in a joint study effort to study the phenomenon.BUT THEY DID NOT SHOW PHOTOGRAPHS OF CRAFT OR BODIES?No, they did not show anything specific. They just spoke in general terms. They did showthe files, the place where they store the files they showed where they keep the documents.But they did not go into specifics.THAT WAS IN WHICH BUILDING IN BRASILIA?They have been to CINDACTA I which is like a NORAD, a Brazilian NORAD.IN THE UNITED STATES, IT'S INSIDE A MOUNTAIN IN COLORADO. IN BRAZIL,WHERE IS CINDACTA?Brasilia.IT'S IN THE CAPITOL OF BRAZIL? IS IT INSIDE A MOUNTAIN ORUNDERGROUND?No, it's a building. I sent you a picture of Urandir in front of Cindacta.WHEN URANDIR WENT TO THE MEETING, WAS HE IN BRASILIA AT THATBUILDING?Ye s .DID THE BRAZILIAN GOVERNMENT MAKE A STATEMENT IN WHICH THEYSAID THERE WOULD BE A CERTAIN DATE IN WHICH EVERYTHING, ALL OFTHE FILES, WOULD BE ACCESSIBLE TO ANYONE WHO WENT TO BRASILIA TOASK?They are already open, effective from now. He said the only thing is there are certainsecret files. You can go there, review them, look at them, copy them, but you cannot takethe originals away from the building. No Major Newspaper Coverageof Brazil Air Force Meeting in BrasiliaWHAT EXACTLY WERE THE HEADLINES IN THE BRASILIA AND RIO DEJANEIRO MEDIA WHAT DID THE HEADLINES IN THE NEWSPAPERS SAY?

So far nothing in the press media has come out about this, but there were journalists fromFolha de Fao de Paulo, which is a major newspaper and another major newspaper fromSao Paulo. But so far nothing has come out in the press only on television. Fantastico!which is 67% of the country follows this program on Sunday nights.WHICH STATION IS THAT ON AND FROM WHICH CITY?Globo TVGLOBO TV, AND IS THAT BROADCAST OUT OF RIO DE JANEIRO OR BRASILIA?Rio de Janeiro.WHAT KIND OF SUBJECTS DO THEY COVER?Everything it's like news, football news, entertainment it's like an electronic magazine. 2.5hour program.AND RIGHT NOW FA N TA S T I C O ! IS THE ONLY PROGRAM THAT YOU ARE AWARETHAT THIS OPEN DISCUSSION WITH AIR FORCE AND GOVERNMENTOFFICIALS TOOK PLACE ABOUT OPENING UFO FILES?Yes. That's the amazing thing.AND IT HAS NOT BEEN IN ANY OF THE NEWSPAPERS?None that I'm aware of.HOW WOULD YOU EXPLAIN THAT?As if they are fishing the public they are testing the pulse of the public. That's what I thinkbecause Fantastico! is a major, major program in the Brazilian TV seen by millions ofpeople.FELIPE, THAT'S MY POINT. IF A TELEVISION BROADCAST THAT REACHESMOST OF THE BRAZILIAN POPULATION HAS AN OPEN DISCUSSION ABOUTTHE GOVERNMENT OF BRAZIL OPENING UP ALL THESE FILES, WOULDN'TTHAT BE HEADLINES IN ALL OF THE NEWSPAPERS?It should have been headlines first thing on Monday, not only in the Brazilian press butalso in the 24-hour news we have a CNN, Globo News, it's a Brazilian news. It should becovered by Globo News and all other networks. It was a major I watched the program. Itwas amazing. But there was no follow up.THAT'S IT, WHY HAVEN'T THE MAJOR NEWSPAPERS FOLLOWED UP ON THEMAJOR TV SHOW?I cannot guess."Continued in Part 2 - Corguinho, Brazil: Plasma Balls Which Enter HumansMore Information:See other Earthfiles reports about Corguinho, Brazil, events in the Earthfiles Archives:· 05/24/2004 -- Biophysicist W.
